hint: A living entity capable of growth, reproduction, and adaptation.
The chemical processes occurring within a living organism.
A group of atoms bonded together.
Specialized structures within a cell that perform specific functions.
The basic unit of life in all living organisms.
Groups of cells that perform a similar function.
A part of the body with a specific function, like the heart or lungs.
A community of interacting organisms and their environment.
The regions of Earth occupied by living organisms.
